rows.label: tev078301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Orleron about the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Orleron about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_SEL1001
rows.name: Ask Orleron about the Zaruboggan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Orleron about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Is what Vera told me true? *fsssh* If you humans don't
secure your Lifehold Core soon, you will be destroyed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG0002
rows.name: What a fragile existence you seem to lead. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG0003
rows.name:
*fsssh* I doubt there's anything that I could do,
but rest assured I would act without question.
I hope you can recover your Lifehold soon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Vera is quite important to... Well, rather I should say
that all humans are indispensable. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG0005
rows.name:
If you were to be destroyed, we Zaruboggan that were
left behind in this city would quickly run out of voltant
and disappear ourselves. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG0010
rows.name:
Thank you very much! *fsssh* Because of your advice,
I was able to improve my relationship with Vera.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG0011
rows.name:
As a sign of reconciliation, we've been discussing the
possibility of my joining her on some fieldwork. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG0012
rows.name:
We'd be scavenging for animal corpses and highly
toxic voltant. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG0013
rows.name:
I suppose this is what humans would call a date?
*fsssh* I am quite looking forward to it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG1001
rows.name:
At first, I thought of Zaruboggan as pathetic creatures,
inseparably chained to our calling. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG1002
rows.name:
But I've since encountered humans in New LA who have
lost sight of their purpose and fallen into deep despair.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG1003
rows.name:
It made me think that perhaps there is value in the
simplicity of my people's lives? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG1004
rows.name:
Take my father, Arsenican. So long as he has voltant
to devoltanize, he knows true happiness and feels not a
care in the world. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG1005
rows.name:
I imagine that to a human full of worries,
his life might seem an enviable one. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG1010
rows.name:
Hey, [ST:playername ]! *fsssh*
Thanks for your help back in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG1011
rows.name:
Since that day, I've continued working with a group of
BLADEs to search for Miran voltant. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG1012
rows.name:
But I promise that I'm not being a drag on them!
BLADE seems to have plenty of use for a guy like me
who's willing to follow them anywhere. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG1013
rows.name:
So they're happy, and I get to fulfill my Zaruboggan
calling in a way only I could. Everyone wins! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078301_MSG1014
rows.name:
But of course, I can still have some fun while I'm at it!
We should get together for a game of tennis. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]
